title: ZigiOps Integration Platform
description: ZigiOps connects ITOM, ITSM, CRM, Cloud, and DevOps systems - like Jira, Micro Focus, BMC Remedy, Datadog, Splunk, Nutanix, Dynatrace, Azure DevOps, VMware, Zabbix, Salesforce, AppDynamics, ServiceNow, & more. It comes with a library of pre-defined templates.
